message.content:
cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a sensing policy for cognitive radios, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The use of a multi-armed bandit model and index policy suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The application of the policy to cognitive radios also suggests a focus on networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) and systems and control (cs.SY).
